SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SID DESC) RNUM, SID, TO_CHAR(LOG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LOG_DTM, DECODE(LOG_DIV, 'W', '사용자', 'M', '어드민') AS LOG_DIV_NM, LOG_DIV, USER_ID, LOGIN_IP, SCREEN_ID, SCREEN_NM, RMK, URI FROM CMM_LOG WHERE LOG_DIV IN ('W', 'M', 'S')
AND LOG_DTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{F_LOG_DTM}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{T_LOG_DTM}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{USER_ID}||'%'
AND LOG_DIV = #{LOG_DIV}
AND SCREEN_ID LIKE '%'||#{SCREEN_ID}||'%'
AND SCREEN_NM LIKE '%'||#{SCREEN_NM}||'%'
AND RMK LIKE '%'||#{RMK}||'%'
ORDER BY SID DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SID DESC) RNUM, SID, TO_CHAR(LOG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LOG_DTM, 'API' AS LOG_DIV_NM, LOG_DIV, USER_ID, LOGIN_IP, SCREEN_ID, SCREEN_NM, RMK, URI, API_ID, API_KEY, DETAIL_CNT FROM CMM_LOG WHERE LOG_DIV = 'A'
AND LOG_DTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{F_LOG_DTM}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{T_LOG_DTM}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{USER_ID}||'%'
AND API_ID LIKE '%'||#{API_ID}||'%'
AND API_KEY LIKE '%'||#{API_KEY}||'%'
AND RMK LIKE '%'||#{RMK}||'%'
ORDER BY SID DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SID DESC) RNUM, SID, TO_CHAR(LOG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LOG_DTM, SCREEN_ID, SCREEN_NM, RMK FROM CMM_LOG WHERE LOG_DIV = 'B'
AND LOG_DTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{F_LOG_DTM}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{T_LOG_DTM}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND SCREEN_ID LIKE '%'||#{SCREEN_ID}||'%'
AND SCREEN_NM LIKE '%'||#{SCREEN_NM}||'%'
AND RMK LIKE '%'||#{RMK}||'%'
ORDER BY SID DESC
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CMM_LOG_MNG USING DUAL ON ( SCREEN_ID = #{SCREEN_ID} AND URI = #{URI} AND RMK = REPLACE(#{RMK}, ' ', '') ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET REG_ID = #{REG_ID}, REG_DTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (KEY, SCREEN_ID, URI, RMK, REG_ID, REG_DTM) VALUES (SYS_GUID(), #{SCREEN_ID}, #{URI}, REPLACE(#{RMK}, ' ', ''), #{REG_ID}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT SCREEN_ID AS screenId, URI AS uri, RMK AS rmk FROM CMM_LOG_MNG

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.SCREEN_ID) RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.KEY, A.SCREEN_ID, B.MENU_NM AS SCREEN_NM, A.URI, A.RMK, A.REG_ID, A.REG_DTM FROM CMM_LOG_MNG A, CMM_MENU_MAS B WHERE A.SCREEN_ID = B.MENU_ID(+) ) A WHERE 1=1
AND A.SCREEN_ID LIKE '%'||#{P_SCREEN_ID}||'%'
AND A.SCREEN_NM LIKE '%'||#{SEARCH_TXT}||'%'
AND A.URI LIKE '%'||#{SEARCH_TXT}||'%'
AND A.RMK LIKE '%'||#{SEARCH_TXT}||'%'
ORDER BY SCREEN_ID
